channel.title: Happy Murder Day to you! Rip the game. Going to improve it and not rush this time :(
channel.description:
# HAPPY <s>BIRTHDAY</s> :knife: MURDER DAY!!!
# Hosted by Firekitten ### With NightX as cohost ### Signups Are open
# Rules
No gamethrowing No angleshooting No editing posts No cheating
# Gameplay The day phase lasts 72 hours or until both the present and lynch is complete. The night lasts 24 hours. Ties are left to RNGsus
# Cards > # [color=green]Friend[/color] > [color=green]FACTION TYPE[/color] > PASSIVE (Passive) - If you are lucky to get a passive > DAY ABILITY (Day) - Random day ability if you are lucky > NIGHT ABILITY (Night) - Random night ability No luck required to get one of these. Everyone will have one. > GOAL. Lynch all evildoers.
> # [color=red]The Ruiner[/color] > [color=red]FACTION TYPE[/color] > PASSIVE (Passive) - If you are a lucky mafia you may have one > DAY ABILITY (Day) - Lucky people only > Night Ability (Night) - Night ability… DON’T WORRY EVERYONE GETS ONE > GOAL. Kill all that are not neutral or are not in the ruiner.
> ## [color=[color=#FF0303]F[/color][color=#FF0710]r[/color][color=#FF0B1D]i[/color][color=#FF0F2A]e[/color][color=#FF1337]n[/color][color=#FF1844]d[/color][color=#FF1C51]'[/color][color=#FF205E]s[/color] [color=#FF2878]F[/color][color=#FF2D85]r[/color][color=#FF3192]i[/color][color=#FF359F]e[/color][color=#FF39AC]nd[/color] > [color=Grey]Neutral[/color] PASSIVE (Passive) - You have one of these DAY ABILITY (Day) - You have one of these NIGHT ABILITY (Night) - Wow..You also have one of these. > GOAL. Survive to see friends lose!
> # [color=black]The Enemy[/color] > [color=black]Neutral Killer[/color] > PASSIVE (Passive) - Night Immune. Maybe more! > DAY ABILITY (Day) - You have a good one… > Cake Overload(Night) - Give someone so much cake they explode. (Killing them and only them) > GOAL. Kill everyone that will stand in your way. Neutrals are fine.
# To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
# Presents!
Every day before the lynch, everybody must decide who gets the present. It can be a good present, and give you a boon, or a bad present, and curse you. The Enemy and Friend's Friend may hold some sway here...
# Rolelist:
[color=green]Friend Friend Friend Friend Friend Friend Friend Friend[/color] [color=red]Ruiner Ruiner Ruiner[/color] [color=pink]Friend's Friend[/color] [color=black]Enemy[/color]
Rolelist will be updates as players join.
# Players: 1. @Margaret 2. @Sam17z 3. @MaximusPrime 4. @Whammerist 5. @NuclearBurrito 6. @psychoneirik 7. @Marluxion . 9. @Strangle 10. @Void_Magician 11. @Shurian 12. Boss110 13. Pug 14. htm 15. Joker 16. 17. Unlimited slots are available People who just like watching the murder happen (AKA SPECATOR) 1. Twilight 2. 3.
